      • getPointOnLineInto

        result - implementation of WB_MutableCoordinate to store result in

      • getParametricPointOnSegment

        WB_Point getParametricPointOnSegment(double t)
        Get point along segment at fraction t of length. Return result as a new point
        Parameters:
        t - fraction of segment length from origin, clamped to range [0,1]
        Returns:
        point along segment at distance t of origin
